message.name: ERR_FV_BUILDING_RESPONSE_MESSAGE
message.locale: There was a problem building the response message

message.name: ERR_LOCATING_WEB_SERVICE
message.locale: An error occurred when locating the %1s web services.

message.name: ERR_MALFORMED_URL
message.locale: The location URL specified for %1s is malformed.

message.name: ERR_SENDING_APPLICATION
message.locale: An error occurred when attempting to send an application to %1s .

message.name: ERR_SENDING_WITHDRAWAL_REQUEST
message.locale: An error occurred when attempting to send a withdrawal request to %1s .

message.name: ERR_PROCESSING_WITHDRAWAL_REQUEST_ON_LEGACY_SYSTEM
message.locale: An error occurred while processing the withdrawal request on %1s .

message.name: ERR_PROCESSING_APPLICATION_ON_LEGACY_SYSTEM
message.locale: An error occurred while processing the application on %1s .

message.name: ERR_CLIENT_CONFIG_FILE_MISSING
message.locale: The Client Configuration file for the %1s system could not be loaded.

message.name: ERR_ROOT_ENTITY_NOT_FOUND_IN_DATASTORE
message.locale: The root entity was not found when attempting to read from the datastore.

message.name: ERR_INTAKE_APPLICATION_UPDATE
message.locale: An error occurred updating an intake program application.

message.name: ERR_WITHDRAWAL_REQUEST_UPDATE
message.locale: An error occurred updating a withdrawal request.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_INTAKE_APPLICATION_UPDATE
message.locale: The intake program application update from the %1s system is invalid.

message.name: ERR_NO_INTAKE_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_ID
message.locale: IntakeApplicationID was missing from the update.

message.name: ERR_NO_INTAKE_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_STATUS
message.locale: IntakeProgramApplication status was missing from the update.

message.name: ERR_APPROVE_ACTIVE_WITHDRAWAL_REQUEST
message.locale: Program applications should be withdrawn by approving the active withdrawal request.

message.name: ERR_NO_CODETABLE_WEBSERVICE_MAPPING
message.locale: An invalid code value was returned from external system %1s

message.name: ERR_MARSHALING_APPLICATION_UPDATE_XML
message.locale: An error occurred when trying to marshal the application update XML.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATING_APPLICATION_UPDATE_XML
message.locale: An error occurred when trying to validate the program application update XML.

message.name: ERR_VALIDATING_WITHDRAWAL_REQUEST_UPDATE_XML
message.locale: An error occurred when trying to validate the withdrawal request update XML.

message.name: ERR_PROCESSING_APPLICATION_UPDATE_XML
message.locale: An error occurred when trying to process the application update.

message.name: ERR_APPLICATION_HANDLED_BY_CURAM
message.locale: An application update was sent for a program application that is handled by Curam.

message.name: ERR_NO_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_ID
message.locale: No intakeProgramApplicationID was sent.

message.name: ERR_NO_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_STATUS
message.locale: No program application status was sent.

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_DISPOSED_NO_DISPOSED_DATE_TIME
message.locale: Program Application has a status of disposed, but no disposed date time was sent.

message.name: ERR_NO_WITHDRAWAL_REQUEST_ID
message.locale: No withdrawalRequestID was sent.

message.name: ERR_NO_WITHDRAWAL_REQUEST_STATUS
message.locale: No withdrawal request status was sent.

message.name: ERR_NO_WITHDRAWAL_REQUEST_RESOLVED_DATETIME
message.locale: No withdrawal request resolved date time was sent.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_DATETIME_STRING
message.locale: An error occurred parsing a date time value passed from the external system.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_STATUS
message.locale: An invalid intake program application status was passed from the external system.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_WITHDRAWAL_REQUEST_STATUS
message.locale: An invalid withdrawal request status was passed from the external system.

message.name: ERR_UNRECOGNIZED_CALLBACK
message.locale: Web services authentication error: invalid callback alias.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_USER_NAME
message.locale: User name %1s is not an alias for any external system configured.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_PROGRAM_APP_DENIAL_REASON
message.locale: %1s is not a valid Intake Program Application denial reason.

message.name: ERR_UNSUPPORTED_CALLBACK
message.locale: Alias %1s is not a valid alias for Curam server call backs.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_ID_VALUE
message.locale: The ID value passed in did not contain a valid long value.

message.name: ERR_NO_WREQ_DENIAL_REASON
message.locale: A blank denial reason was passed from the external system.

message.name: ERR_NO_INTAKE_APPLICATION_REFERENCE
message.locale: No applicationReference was sent.

message.name: ERR_NO_APPLICATION_PROGRAM_REFERENCE
message.locale: No applicationProgramReference was sent.

message.name: ERR_INITIALIZING_WEB_SERVICE
message.locale: An error occurred during the initialization of the web service.

message.name: ERR_NO_WEB_TARGET_SYSTEM_SERVICE_FOUND
message.locale: No associated target system service of type %1s could be found for target system %2s.
